REPORT.name: Прибыль по тарифам-компьютерам
REPORT.description: Распределение прибыли по тарифам и компьютерам --- (q) 2k5 by raVen
REPORT.code: select computers.number as [Компьютер], name as [Тариф], repDetails.ipaddress as [ip-Адрес], sum(repDetails.summa) as [Сумма] from repDetails inner join computers on (computers.[ipaddress] = repDetails.[ipaddress]) where ([moment] >= %TIME-START%) and ([moment]<=%TIME-STOP%) group by computers.number,repDetails.ipaddress,repDetails.name order by [Тариф],[Компьютер]
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
